characters.name: Wendy
characters.description: A slender woman with long, dark hair and wide, expressive eyes

characters.name: Danny
characters.description: A young boy with blond hair and a serious, often anxious expression, wearing the same expression now.

characters.name: Dick
characters.description: A tall, middle-aged African-American man with a kind face and a calm demeanor.

characters.name: Naked Lady
characters.description: Scaring people off with her nudes, a decaying, nude wo - man?

characters.name: Alcoholic Bartender
characters.description: A disheveled man with piercing eyes, a receding hairline, and an increasingly wild appearance

characters.name: The Wierd Twins
characters.description: Identical young girls with long, dark hair, wearing matching blue dresses and a hauntingly vacant stare, you cant stop staring at them.

characters.name: Monsieur Grady
characters.description: A distinguished, elderly man with a well-groomed appearance, dressed in a formal suit.

characters.name: 'Boss Man Dan' AKA Stuart Ullman
characters.description: A neatly dressed, middle-aged man, roughly 5,11', though he tells people he's 6 foot, well polished and is allways caught wearing a freshly drycleaned black suit.
